indicator.screen.title: Indicator Setting
indicator.screen.option1.tooltip: Takes the health value from the player's table (This is the value that is under the player's nickname)
indicator.screen.option2.tooltip: Vanilla animation of hearts like from status bar
indicator.screen.option4.tooltip: Select how far away from the player the indicator will be displayed
indicator.screen.option5.tooltip: Display all entity health in one row
indicator.screen.option11: Show display name for invisible entities
